name: Interstellar Roots
description: • Interstellar Roots is an exciting journey through the universe where players will discover the secrets of their ancestry. The game features a unique cast of quirky and lovable alien characters, taking players on an interstellar adventure as they attempt to determine the identity of their true parents. With a focus on intergalactic genealogy, players will delve deep into the history of their family tree, exploring the mysteries of the stars and the universe. So grab your spacesuit and get ready for an epic journey that will uncover the truth about your past.
